content:
the sample IG has this dependency

  <dependsOn>
    <uri value="https://simplifier.net/packages/de.medizininformatikinitiative.kerndatensatz.fall/0.9.1/files/131317"/>
    <packageId value="de.medizininformatikinitiative.kerndatensatz.fall"/>
    <version value="0.9.1"/>
  </dependsOn>

Is this intended?
It seems like a somewhat odd dependency to have, but I think that showing how to declare dependencies is a good thing for the sample IG to do...
indeed, my point is - if this is needed, should this be the dependency?
It would be good to use another sample IG for that purpose, not a country specific one...
Perhaps a uv IG and maybe one published by HL7?
would be good to show depending on one that is NOT hl7 published. I am struggling with this in IHE with one IG depending on another.
would actually recommend depending on TWO. one a common HL7 one (maybe IPS?), and another that is external.
it tests that this particular dependency works - it's a challenging one to get right
